name: Task Completion File Organization
description: Automatically organize files based on metadata when tasks are completed
_comment: DISABLED: taskStatus trigger type is not supported by Kiro IDE. Only fileCreated, fileEdited, fileDeleted, and manual trigger types are supported. This hook attempted to use taskStatus with condition status_changed_to_completed, which is also unsupported. File organization is now manual or can be triggered via organize-by-metadata.sh script. Preserved for reference.

action.prompt: A task has just been completed. Please run file organization to ensure any new artifacts are properly organized based on their **Organization** metadata. Use the organize-by-metadata.sh hook to check for files that need organization and move them to appropriate directories while maintaining cross-reference integrity.
